alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern White County through 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Wolcott, or 10 miles northeast of Atkinson, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brookston. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 185 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
